subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Dmitry Tursunov beat Frank Dancevic, 6-4, 7-5, in the final of the Indianapolis Championships yesterday.Tursunov, ranked 27th in the world and seeded third, was competing in his first ATP final of the year. It was his second career title, the first coming at Mumbai in 2006. He did not face a seeded player on his way to the championship.
